message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for a starting price of $200. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your generosity, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $120 for the product. Thank you for considering my offer.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go quite that low. How about we meet in the middle at $160?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the effort, but I still believe that $120 would be a fair price for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement closer to my budget.
